titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MARGIN INVOLVED INDICATION CODE (PROXIMAL OR DISTAL RESECTION MARGIN) - Also Known As

body.p: This data element is also known by these names:

strow.stentry: MARGIN INVOLVED INDICATION CODE (POSITIVE PROXIMAL OR DISTAL RESECTION MARGIN)
MARGIN INVOLVED INDICATION CODES (PROXIMAL OR DISTAL RESECTION MARGIN)
